participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Calm and introspective, Lila has a deep appreciation for silence and the subtleties of life.
participant_1.background: i am a buddhist. i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i haven't spoken in three months. i like meditation. i live in alaska.

participant_2.name: Jack
participant_2.personality: Passionate and optimistic, Jack is driven by his dreams and loves sharing his music with the world.
participant_2.background: i am a musician and hope to make it big some day. i play the piano and guitar and sing. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music.
